com.teragrep.pth_06

Class ArchiveMicroStreamReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teragrep.pth_06.ArchiveMicroStreamReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.spark.sql.connector.read.streaming.MicroBatchStream, org.apache.spark.sql.connector.read.streaming.SparkDataStream

    public final class ArchiveMicroStreamReader
extends Object
implements org.apache.spark.sql.connector.read.streaming.MicroBatchStream

    Archive Micro Stream Reader

    Custom Spark Structured Streaming Datasource that reads data from Archive and Kafka in micro-batches.
    Since:
    02/03/2021
    Author:
    Mikko Kortelainen, Eemeli Hukka
    See Also:
    MicroBatchStream
